name: Full Throttle 2
overview: Get on your racing leathers, clip down the visor on your helmet, and prepare yourself for the best excitement you have experiences since the original FULL THROTTLE. Zeppelin have given you the ultimate, rotary-engined 750cc Superbike to race in this year's Risers' Championship. Ahead of you lie eight full scale International circuits and forty of the World's top riders - so open up your bike to FULL THROTTLE 2! As you lean hard into the first bend you'll know that FULL THROTTLE 2 is no ordinary game. The incredible scale speeds, details landscapes and unique gravity variation system allow FULL THROTTLE 2 to take you for the Superbike ride of your lifetime.
